description:
BAMMA (British Association of Mixed Martial Arts) Bantamweight World Champion, Shay Walsh takes you through the fundamental Mixed Martial Arts (MMA) strikes, defence, takedowns and grappling techniques.

This course is designed to teach you the basics in your own home.

Take this course if you:

  • Want to learn MMA from a World Champion in your own home
  • Want to sharpen up your MMA skills
  • Want to learn techniques you can use in self defence situations
  • Want to increase your fitness

This course has been designed by Shay Walsh and features over one hour of professionally shot footage of Shay Walsh in training. Each lecture explains the technique in question, why and how to use it, breaks the move down to allow you to practice easily and provides key points to remember.
title: MMA Fundamentals with Shay Walsh
